question: Which of the following was the successor of Vakataka ruler Devasena?
explanation:
Devasena was aÂ  pleasure-seeking ruler. He was succeded by Harisena who was the ablest and the greatest ruler
of this Vatsagulma Branch/line. He conquered Kuntala, Avanti, Kalinga, Kosala, Konkan, and Andhra.
